list.condition: Must be in team NexT - Núcleo de Estudos em Xadrez & Tecnologias

quote.text: I am pleased that in a match for the World Championship I was able to conduct a game in the style of Akiba Rubinstein, where the entire strategic course was maintained from the first to the last move. (on Game 7 of his 2012 match with Anand)
quote.author: Boris Gelfand

description: Torneio válido para o Circuito NexT FullChess Series 25-2 (válido apenas para contas que não violarem os Termos de Serviço do Lichess e/ou não tiverem sido encerradas)
